sentence: He managed to play surprisingly well at tackle over the last two seasons despite having a guard’s body and foot quickness.” Why the Upgrade is a Possibility Here’s why the need for upgraded help is on the table for the Rams: Starting guard Austin Corbett and center Brian Allen.
author: Lorenzo Reyna
title: Rams Urged to ‘Upgrade’ Help for Matthew Stafford in 2022

sentence: “Coming off of an Achilles’, six months, and doing what he can to help our football team win, just having him back was awesome,” Rams center Brian Allen said Thursday.
author: Kevin Modesti
title: Super wasn’t good enough for Rams’ Cam Akers
